graph.original_query: Create a dark-themed, modern multi-page landing website using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN (no build tools), with 4 pages: index.html (hero with fullscreen background image from picsum.photos or placeholder.com, features, testimonials, CTA, footer with social icons), about.html (mission statement, timeline or values, team cards), products.html (6–8 product/service cards in a grid with title, description, image, price, optional filters), and contact.html (contact form with name/email/message, map placeholder or location card, support links), using consistent dark mode theme, responsive layout, shared header/footer, no lorem ipsum, proper meta tags and titles, and only HTML/CSS/JS. Call CoderAgent atleast 9-10 times for different exhaustive but specific tasks as this is a detailed project. Remember CoderAgent is stateless and can't see other outputs. So you will have to be very specific in creating only parts else it will create full htmls. Make sure that files are properly integrated at the end.

globals_schema.execution_result_T001: Enhanced styling, added interactivity, and ensured responsiveness for the landing page.
globals_schema.execution_result_T003: Created a detailed about.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.
globals_schema.execution_result_T004: Created a detailed products.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS.
globals_schema.execution_result_T005: Created a detailed contact.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.
globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Extended index.html with testimonials carousel, CTA, and footer, maintaining dark mode theme and responsiveness.
globals_schema.execution_result_T006: Created a reusable header component (shared_header.html) with a responsive dark-themed navigation menu, suitable for all four pages.
globals_schema.execution_result_T010: Created a global CSS stylesheet using Tailwind CSS classes for a dark-themed website with responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create index.html: Hero section with fullscreen background image, features section.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a detailed index.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. The page should include a hero section with a fullscreen background image sourced from picsum.photos or placeholder.com. Additionally, include a features section highlighting key benefits. Ensure the dark mode theme is consistently applied, and the layout is responsive for various screen sizes. Do not use lorem ipsum. Use proper meta tags and titles. The HTML should be well-structured and semantically correct.

output.execution_result_T001: Enhanced styling, added interactivity, and ensured responsiveness for the landing page.

execution_result.execution_result_T001: Enhanced styling, added interactivity, and ensured responsiveness for the landing page.

output.execution_result_T001: Created index.html with hero section, features, and dark theme using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.
output.next_instruction: Enhance styling, add interactivity, and ensure full responsiveness.

output.execution_result_T001: Enhanced styling, added interactivity, and ensured responsiveness for the landing page.

nodes.description: Create index.html: Testimonials section with carousel, CTA button, and footer with social icons.
nodes.agent_prompt: Extend the index.html file (previously created) with a testimonials section featuring a carousel for displaying customer feedback. Include a call-to-action (CTA) button encouraging user engagement. Add a footer section with social media icons linking to relevant platforms. Ensure the dark mode theme is consistently applied, and the layout remains responsive. Remember to maintain proper HTML structure and semantic correctness. All components must be styled using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS via CDN.

output.execution_result_T002: Extended index.html with testimonials carousel, CTA, and footer, maintaining dark mode theme and responsiveness.

code_variants.CODE_1A:
# Safe file access for call_self iteration filename = inputs.get('index_html_hero_features_T001', 'index.html') try: with open(filename, 'r') as f: content = f.read() except FileNotFoundError: # Create basic structure if missing content = ''' Premium Product Launch

Revolutionize Your Workflow

The ultimate solution for modern productivity

Start Free Trial
''' # Testimonials Section testimonial_section = '''

What Our Customers Say

"Exceptional product! It has transformed the way we work. Highly recommended!"

- John Doe, CEO

"The customer support is top-notch. They are always ready to help and resolve any issues quickly."

- Jane Smith, Marketing Manager

"Incredible value for the price. The features are robust, and the interface is intuitive."

- David Lee, CTO

''' # Call-to-Action Section cta_section = '''

Ready to Get Started?

Join our community and revolutionize your workflow today!

Start Free Trial
''' # Footer Section footer_section = '''

© 2024 Premium Product. All rights reserved.

''' # Add Font Awesome CDN for social media icons (make sure it doesn't exist) font_awesome_cdn = '' if '' in content: content = content.replace('', font_awesome_cdn + '') else: content += font_awesome_cdn # Insert sections into the HTML before the closing body tag if '' in content: content = content.replace('', testimonial_section + cta_section + footer_section + '') else: content += testimonial_section + cta_section + footer_section + '' with open(filename, 'w') as f: f.write(content) return {'index_html_complete_T002': filename, 'execution_result_T002': 'Extended index.html with testimonials carousel, CTA, and footer, maintaining dark mode theme and responsiveness.'}

execution_result.execution_result_T002: Extended index.html with testimonials carousel, CTA, and footer, maintaining dark mode theme and responsiveness.

nodes.description: Create about.html: Mission statement section, timeline of company values, and team member cards.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a detailed about.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. The page should include a section for the company's mission statement, a timeline showcasing company values, and team member cards. Ensure the dark mode theme is consistently applied, and the layout is responsive for various screen sizes. Do not use lorem ipsum. Use proper meta tags and titles. The HTML should be well-structured and semantically correct. Implement all components using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

output.execution_result_T003: Created a detailed about.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

code_variants.CODE_1A:
html_content = ''' About Us - [Your Company Name]

About Us

Our Mission

To empower individuals through innovative solutions and foster a community of continuous growth and learning. We are committed to providing exceptional value to our customers and creating a positive impact on society.

Our Values

1

Innovation

We embrace creativity and constantly seek new and improved ways to serve our customers.

2

Integrity

We conduct our business with the highest ethical standards, ensuring transparency and honesty in all our interactions.

3

Customer Focus

Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We strive to understand their needs and exceed their expectations.

Our Team

John Doe

CEO

Jane Smith

CTO

Peter Jones

Head of Marketing

© 2024 [Your Company Name]. All rights reserved.

''' with open('about.html', 'w') as f: f.write(html_content) return {'about_html_complete_T003': 'about.html', 'execution_result_T003': 'Created a detailed about.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.'}

execution_result.execution_result_T003: Created a detailed about.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Create products.html: Grid layout for 6–8 product/service cards with image, title, description, and price.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a detailed products.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. The page should feature a grid layout for displaying 6-8 product/service cards. Each card should include an image, title, description, and price. Ensure the dark mode theme is consistently applied, and the layout is responsive for various screen sizes. Do not use lorem ipsum. Use proper meta tags and titles. The HTML should be well-structured and semantically correct. All elements must be implemented using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

output.execution_result_T004: Created a detailed products.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS.

code_variants.CODE_1A:
html_content = ''' Premium Products

Our Premium Products

''' products = [ { "image": "https://source.unsplash.com/300x200/?gadget", "name": "Smart Watch", "description": "Stay connected in style with our advanced smartwatch.", "price": "199" }, { "image": "https://source.unsplash.com/300x200/?laptop", "name": "Laptop Pro", "description": "Experience powerful performance with our latest Laptop Pro.", "price": "1299" }, { "image": "https://source.unsplash.com/300x200/?headphones", "name": "Wireless Headphones", "description": "Immerse yourself in high-quality sound with these wireless headphones.", "price": "249" }, { "image": "https://source.unsplash.com/300x200/?camera", "name": "Digital Camera", "description": "Capture stunning photos and videos with our digital camera.", "price": "499" }, { "image": "https://source.unsplash.com/300x200/?tablet", "name": "Tablet X", "description": "Enjoy portable entertainment and productivity with our Tablet X.", "price": "349" }, { "image": "https://source.unsplash.com/300x200/?smartphone", "name": "Smartphone Z", "description": "Experience the ultimate mobile technology with Smartphone Z.", "price": "799" } ] for product in products: html_content += f'''

{product['name']}

{product['description']}

${product['price']}
''' html_content += '''

© 2024 Premium Products. All rights reserved.

''' with open('products.html', 'w') as f: f.write(html_content) return {'products_html_complete_T004': 'products.html', 'execution_result_T004': 'Created a detailed products.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS.'}

execution_result.execution_result_T004: Created a detailed products.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Create contact.html: Contact form (name, email, message), map placeholder, and support links.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a detailed contact.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. The page should include a contact form with fields for name, email, and message. Include a map placeholder or a location card. Additionally, add support links to assist users. Ensure the dark mode theme is consistently applied, and the layout is responsive for various screen sizes. Do not use lorem ipsum. Use proper meta tags and titles. The HTML should be well-structured and semantically correct. Implement all components using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

output.execution_result_T005: Created a detailed contact.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

code_variants.CODE_1A:
html_content = ''' Contact Us - Modern Dark Theme
Your Brand

Get in Touch

Our Location

Support Links

  • FAQ
  • Help Center
  • Contact Support

© 2024 Your Brand. All rights reserved.

''' with open('contact.html', 'w') as f: f.write(html_content) return {'contact_html_complete_T005': 'contact.html', 'execution_result_T005': 'Created a detailed contact.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.'}

execution_result.execution_result_T005: Created a detailed contact.html file with a dark-themed, modern design using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Create shared header using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS for all pages.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a reusable header component using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS for a dark-themed website. The header should include a responsive navigation menu suitable for all four pages (index.html, about.html, products.html, contact.html). Ensure the header adheres to the dark mode theme and is designed to be easily integrated into each HTML file. Provide the HTML code for the header component.

output.execution_result_T006: Created a reusable header component (shared_header.html) with a responsive dark-themed navigation menu, suitable for all four pages.

code_variants.CODE_1A:
header_html = '''
DarkFlow
  • Home
  • About
  • Products
  • Contact
''' with open('shared_header.html', 'w') as f: f.write(header_html) return {'shared_header_html_T006': 'shared_header.html', 'execution_result_T006': 'Created a reusable header component (shared_header.html) with a responsive dark-themed navigation menu, suitable for all four pages.'}

execution_result.execution_result_T006: Created a reusable header component (shared_header.html) with a responsive dark-themed navigation menu, suitable for all four pages.

nodes.description: Create shared footer using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS for all pages.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a reusable footer component using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS for a dark-themed website. The footer should include social media icons and copyright information. Ensure the footer adheres to the dark mode theme and is designed to be easily integrated into each HTML file (index.html, about.html, products.html, contact.html). Provide the HTML code for the footer component.

nodes.description: Integrate shared header into index.html, about.html, products.html, and contact.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Integrate the shared header HTML code (`shared_header_html_T006`) into the following HTML files: `index_html_complete_T002`, `about_html_complete_T003`, `products_html_complete_T004`, and `contact_html_complete_T005`. Ensure the header is placed correctly at the top of each page and that all links function as expected. All files must be valid and complete HTML files.
nodes.error: Code execution failed: All code variants failed

nodes.description: Integrate shared footer into index.html, about.html, products.html, and contact.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Integrate the shared footer HTML code (`shared_footer_html_T007`) into the following HTML files: `index_html_header_integrated_T008`, `about_html_header_integrated_T008`, `products_html_header_integrated_T008`, and `contact_html_header_integrated_T008`. Ensure the footer is placed correctly at the bottom of each page. All files must be valid and complete HTML files.

nodes.description: Create global stylesheet (CSS) to manage overall site theme and responsiveness.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a global CSS stylesheet using Tailwind CSS classes to manage the overall theme and responsiveness of a dark-themed website.  This CSS should ensure consistent dark mode styling across all pages (index.html, about.html, products.html, contact.html) and maintain responsiveness for various screen sizes.  The stylesheet should be designed to be linked in the head section of each HTML file. Name the file `style.css`.

output.execution_result_T010: Created a global CSS stylesheet using Tailwind CSS classes for a dark-themed website with responsiveness.

execution_result.execution_result_T010: Created a global CSS stylesheet using Tailwind CSS classes for a dark-themed website with responsiveness.

nodes.description: Integrate global stylesheet into index.html, about.html, products.html, and contact.html
nodes.agent_prompt: Integrate the global stylesheet (`global_stylesheet_css_T010`) into the following HTML files: `index_html_final_T009`, `about_html_final_T009`, `products_html_final_T009`, and `contact_html_final_T009`. Ensure the stylesheet is linked correctly in the head section of each page to apply the global dark mode theme and responsiveness. All files must be valid and complete HTML files. Include the necessary meta tags to ensure proper rendering and responsiveness on different devices.

nodes.description: Distill complete website and extract final summary of output HTML files.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a final summary of the website created with the following HTML files and their corresponding stylesheets. Include a summary of the file structure, main sections, and applied styles for `index_html_styled_T011`, `about_html_styled_T011`, `products_html_styled_T011`, and `contact_html_styled_T011`.
